title: When are we getting resistance illaoi on live !
body:
I know its during 8.5 but WHEN.

we already waited 6 months for it

replies.body: It is never given a specific date when skins and champs will go live, this is probably so that people don't get disappointed when the if the release is a little later than planned due to last minute bug fixes
But we wait now for as good as a week just for the official release on the server {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
